CAN_NOT_START.INFO: A manual program is running right now.

SMART_SPRINKLER.TITLE: Smart sprinkler
SMART_SPRINKLER.INFO: Smart sprinkler uses weather data to control the sprinkler runtimes automatically.

RAIN_VALUE.TITLE: Thresholded rain
RAIN_VALUE.INFO: Amount of rain, where watering should be disabled.

WIND.TITLE: Wind
WIND.INFO: Disable watering for wind speed above

WIND_VALUE.TITLE: Thresholded wind speed
WIND_VALUE.INFO: Wind speed, where watering should be disabled.

MAX_TEMP.TITLE: Threshold Max temperature
MAX_TEMP.INFO: Watering will be longer for temperatures above:

MAX_TEMP_VALUE.INFO: Extend watering by the given value.

MIN_TEMP.TITLE: Threshold Min temperature
MIN_TEMP.INFO: Watering will be shortened for temperatures below:

MIN_TEMP_VALUE.TITLE: Shorten watering by:
MIN_TEMP_VALUE.INFO: Shorten watering by the given value.

MAIL.TITLE: Winter warning
MAIL.INFO: Send e-mail notification for temperatures below:

WINTER.TITLE: Winter mode
WINTER.INFO: The winter mode disables all sprinkler runtimes. If this setting is enabled, no configurations can be made.

WEATHER.WIND_TODAY_OFF: The watering for today is disabled, due to high wind speeds.
WEATHER.RAIN_TODAY_OFF: The watering for today is disabled, due to high precipitation.

CAN_NOT_START.INFO: Single sprinkler cycles can not be started

WRONG_SORTING.TITLE: Error in interval order

THIRD_PARTY.TITLE: Third party software

PICKER.TITLE: Thanks! Thanks! Thanks!
PICKER.INFO: Without this, FhemNative wouldn´t be possible.
PICKER.ANGULAR: For the giant amount of ressources and a wonderful framework.
PICKER.IONIC: For the native support and a cool community.
PICKER.ELECTRON: For the native desktop app support.
PICKER.FHEM: For the best home automation software
PICKER.ntruchsess: For a reliable and well structured websocket.

DONATE.TITLE: Support Development
DONATE.INFO: Support the Development of FhemNative by donating a little amount of money.

HELP.TITLE: Help others/Report bugs/Feature requests
HELP.INFO: Hilf the community, reporte your known bugs and place requests in the FHEM forum.

ENABLE.INFO: Activate/deactivate to set the adjusted window size on start of FhemNative

CUSTOM.TITLE: Custom window size

ERROR.INFO: Width and height must be filled.

DES.INFO: Description of the task (for own clarity)

REMOVE_TASK.INFO: Are you sure about removing this task?

CREATE_VARIABLE.TITLE: Create variable
CREATE_VARIABLE.INFO: Create a variable for FhemNative. The variable creates a syntax, that is useable in components

DES.TITLE: Variable description
DES.INFO: Description of the variable (for own clarity)

PREVIEW.TITLE: Variable preview
PREVIEW.INFO: This syntax can be used, to access the value in the variable:

REMOVE_VARIABLE.TITLE: Remove variable
REMOVE_VARIABLE.INFO: Are you sure about removing this variable?

REVERT.TITLE: Back to factory settings
REVERT.INFO: Reset all FhemNative settings to factory defaults.
REVERT.SURE: Are you sure, you want to reset FhemNative to factory defaults?

DONE.TITLE: Settings resetted
DONE.INFO: All settings were resetted to factory defaults.

NO_ROOM_NAME.TITLE: No room name
NO_ROOM_NAME.INFO: Please give the room a name.

USE_AS_GROUP.TITLE: Use room as Menu
USE_AS_GROUP.INFO: Activate/deactivate to use room as menu structure

GROUP_TO.TITLE: Group room to menu structure
GROUP_TO.INFO: Activate/deactivate to group room to menu structure

CUSTOM_INPUTS.INFO: The component has advanced configuration properties.
CUSTOM_INPUTS.DES: Please create the component first and configure the custom properties directly in the component.

SHORT.TITLE: Short definition
SHORT.INFO: Short definition in comparison to default values.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Components exported
SUCCESS.INFO: Components are exported and available under:

ERROR.TITLE: Components not exported
ERROR.INFO: Components can´t be exported. An error occured.

ERROR.TITLE: Components not imported
ERROR.INFO: Components can´t be imported. An error occured.

IP.TITLE: IP address
IP.INFO: IP address of the Fhem server

TYPE.TITLE: Connection type
TYPE.INFO: Which connection type should be chosen

SECURE.TITLE: Secure connection
SECURE.INFO: Enable/disable to establish a secure connection
